metadata.name: NOSTALGHIA
metadata.description:
Artist: MartinVagabond  
Title: NOSTALGHIA  
Collection: Vagabond Nudes | Aphrodite  
Location: Prague, Czech Republic  
Date: 8th Nov 2020

This houseboat was my home for 2 months in late 2020. I was waking up and falling asleep with the view of my favorite place in Prague - Vysehrad, dominated by the two towers of the Saints Peter and Paul Basilica. This is how the image I had daydreamed about came to life.

“Vagabond Nudes | Aphrodite” is the first nude NFT photography collection of MartinVagabond. It contains 10 1/1 monochrome images created in 2020. These images will never be altered or minted again as 1/1s or Editions on the same or any other blockchain by the artist. They come with Extended Editorial License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.  
% of the sales goes to the model.
